summary: Adds a tower north of Solitude.
descriptionHtml:
Name: Tower of Living
Version: 0.5
Date: 8/9/2012 10:23:46 PM
Author(s): MrHam24

Description
========
MY FIRST MOD ON THE SKYRIM NEXUS!!!! YAY!!!!!
This mods adds a small tower to an island off the coast of Solitude. This mod can be considered a cheat mod because of the multiple spell tomes and armor/weapons added. Tower includes a few chests, a basement with more chest for storage, a bed, and some new armor and weapons.


Location: Can fast travel with map marker or use the door in the wall to the left of the Sleeping Giant Inn in Riverwood.


Installation Instructions
=================
Place tower.esp into your skyrim data folder.

Uninstallation Instructions
===================
Delete tower.esp from your skyrim mods folder.

Incompatability
===========
None that I know of.

Known Issues
===========
None that I know of.

Change Log
=========
0.5: Initial release

Credits
======
Me!- Tower
Bethesda- CK

Licensing
=======
Contact before use.
author: MrHam24
